extendedInfo.description: Simple, beautiful, free, with these cool features, Beautiful Uninstaller is the most simple-to-use app uninstaller in the market. The design is extremely clean and beautiful. To uninstall an application, simply launch the application you want to delete, and then drag down the status bar on the top. You can easily find the application you have just launched. Unlike other uninstallers, the advantage of Beautiful Uninstaller is that it saves you from searching for an app to uninstall. It is smart enough to guide you directly to the exact application you need to uninstall. You can even launch several applications one by one, then in Beautiful Uninstaller you can find a list of recently opened apps, right there waiting for you to uninstall easily.Because of the limitations of Android system, this uninstaller can only uninstall 3rd party apps, it cannot uninstall system apps. Rooted phones can use other tools to uninstall system apps.Enjoy this beautiful tool!

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: When you install this a notification tray icon shows up for this app and you cannot in any way remove it. No settings in the app at all. Perfect uninstaller is better. You can do batch deletes with that one. This app is one at a time uninstall. Unacceptable.
reviews.author: Kim L

reviews.title: Clean GUI and No Ads!
reviews.comment: Very nice GUI, no ads or other annoying behavior.  A real keeper and does it\'s intended purpose flawlessly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Neat idea but...
reviews.comment: ...no UI for sorting by size, and refreshes the page and scrolls back to the top whenever you do anything.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: highly recommended
reviews.comment: this is really a good idea. it simply saves my time and changed my habit. now i can download many apps without worrying about the pain to delete them.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: excellent.
reviews.comment: this is gonna be the most popular app in the next couple of months.

reviews.title: Amazing, but lacking
reviews.comment: Works great looks even better. If u added system app uninstall I would totally buy it. Your the only uninstaller with the holo theme... so just donit :)

reviews.title: No Ads
reviews.comment: For anyone who looking for good working & beautiful Unistaller in the market...it\'s here! come and get it!
